template.name: sha256
template.value:
# generate an SHA-256 password hash base64 encoded echo -n "password" | openssl dgst -sha256 -binary | openssl base64
# better yet, use pepper (suffix the password with the pepper) echo -n "passwordpepper" | openssl dgst -sha256 -binary | openssl base64
# better yet, use salt (prefix the password with the salt) echo -n "saltpassword" | openssl dgst -sha256 -binary | openssl base64
